name: places/ChIJ3XvHJBdawokRjF-Qy97Mgb0
adrFormatAddress: 94 Broadway, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text: I had the same experience as a previous reviewer. Only an answering service answers. Dave lied to me and told me one thing then NO contact once he had my laser. It was three times the amount he told me then he wouldn't send my laser back to me. I had to pay UPFRONT and then no contact. It took over a month to get it back and he would not even return my texts of phone calls after I had paid him. It was guaranteed for a year but he did a terrible job with repair and needed repairing again within a year, but there is NO WAY I would ever send back to him. So now I am going to have to pay again to get it fixed.

originalText.text:
In 2019, I had my Lumenis Selecta II SLT laser serviced by a company known as Med Laser Experts  (a/k/a Laser Repair Experts, Sciton Laser Experts).  To make a long story short, my laser was functioning well but it periodically was indicating a warning code.  As a result, after vetting the above named company, I was led to believe that this was their area of expertise and I hired them to service the problem.  Not only did they keep my laser for 6 months, but when I received it back, it was nonfunctional.  Subsequently, when I found out the owner's true name, Samuel David Lehrer (goes by Dave), I learned that many laser owners have had a similar experience with him and his companies.  He has at least one judgment against him and in 2018 there was an investigation and proceeding against him and 7 of his companies by the Florida Attorney General’s Office for alleged unfair and deceptive acts towards consumers, resulting in  civil penalties totaling at least $570,000 being assessed against him and his companies.  He signed an Assurance of Voluntary Compliance with the Attorney General's Office at that time which evidently did not change his behavior.
Unfortunately, I had to pursue legal remedies against Lehrer and am still wound up in the legal process.  He has been found liable for unfair and deceptive trade practices in that lawsuit, but I still have not been compensated for my damages. I feel like I have been violated and it has been an awful experience.  As a result, I am forewarning my colleagues about Samuel David Lehrer in an effort to prevent what happened to me from happening to others.  Caveat emptor!

Neil Zusman, MD, FACS

originalText.text:
PLEASE DO NOT DO BUSINESS WITH THESE PEOPLE!!!  This is NOT a legit business.  They will either perform a bait and switch or send you defective devices and you will be stuck resourcing a repair technician in order to salvage what you can of your investment.  Don't trust Dave and don't trust Karla, they are CROOKS.

Additionally the company name has several aliases i.e. Med Laser Pro and Med Laser Pros, LLC., no receptionist and only an answering service with employees who work in Florida with their office in North Carolina.

Protect your hard earned money and STAY AWAY, STAY AWAY, STAY AWAY.

originalText.text: Scam!! He took the 20% down payment, then disappear.
